Insights.text: "We estimate that about half of all US adults made a purchase via social media in 2021."
Insights.name: Accenture

Insights.text: "Social commerce will grow three times as fast as traditional ecommerce, more than doubling from $492 billion worldwide in 2021 to $1.2 trillion in 2025."
Insights.name: Accenture

Insights.text: "40% of Millennials are very or extremely excited about a hypothetical Super App"

Insights.text: "In 2023 US social commerce sales are expected to surpass $45.74 billion"
Insights.name: BusinessofApps

Insights.text: "Usability rules the web. Simply stated, if the customer canâ€™t find a product, then he or she will not buy it"

Insights.text: "It's not what consumers are spending it's who there spending it with that will shape ecommerce moving forward 2023 and beyond."
Insights.name: Scott Beeker
